name: IBM Cloud Private minimal with load balancers
description: This template will deploy a minimal environment, but load balancers will also be created.

metadata.displayName: IBM Cloud Private CE minimal installation with load balancers
metadata.longDescription: This template will deploy a minimal installation of IBM Cloud Private CE with load balancers into IBM Cloud

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description: 1 boot node, 1 master node, 1 proxy node, 3 worker nodes

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. IBM Knowledge Center for IBM Cloud Private - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSBS6K/product_welcome_cloud_private.html
3. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
